title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't set default 'Enclosing Type' for nested classes
EB: When using Build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the 'new class' button results in the 'Enclosing Type' field being blank. It should default to the current type in the editor.
SR: To fix this issue, in Build 20011106, when a .java file is open in the editor, clicking the 'new class' button should automatically set the 'Enclosing Type' field to the current type in the editor.
